name: CloneBlogPost
description:
Creates a copy of an existing blog post.

This tool clones an existing blog post, creating a new copy with the same content. It should be used when you want to duplicate a post for editing or reuse.

parameters.name: blog_post_id
parameters.description: ID of the blog post to be cloned. This identifies the specific blog post you want to duplicate.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

parameters.name: cloned_blog_post_name
parameters.description: The name for the newly cloned blog post. This is how the cloned post will be titled or identified.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
